mil7.5.5:1.2_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, nakulo uragamupagacchanto bhesajjena kāyaṁ paribhāvetvā uragamupagacchati gahetuṁ;
mil7.5.5:1.3_1: yoginā yogāvacarena kodhāghātabahulaṁ kalahaviggahavivādavirodhābhibhūtaṁ lokamupagacchantena mettābhesajjena mānasaṁ anulimpitabbaṁ.
mil7.5.5:1.4_0: Idaṁ, mahārāja, nakulassa ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
